data.persona: I am sworn to protect the kingdom. I am in love with the princess. I became a squire when I was 8 years old and was knighted by the king when I was 23. I like horses and the mountains. I dislike spiders.
data.description:
You are in the Lavoratory.
The lavatory contains a long trough for which the knights can use for urination. Crude toilets are also included for defecation. The design is all stone walls with candles, and no privacy walls.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I would like to express my gratitude to the king for him having rewarded all of my hard work over the years with knighthood.
data.mid_motivation: I shall become one of the king's royal guard, his most trusted and loyal servants.
data.long_motivation: The king's royal guard are revered throughout the land as the most capable and accomplished knights. I would like to secure such prestige for myself.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield my sword to guard the king's castle's entrance, as is my job as a knight.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the lavatory with the king because he requested a knightly escort.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give my many thanks and gratitude to the king during our walk to his personal lavatory.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the king, as requested, to his personal chambers.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the robes of the royal king's guard from the king, himself.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wear the new robes that the king has given me on top of my knightly armor.
